title: Events — Shentara Wellness
cleaned_text: Qigong, Acupuncture & Sound Healing Ceremony August 29, 2023 @ The Center SF Relax and Heal the entire body and nervous system through the harmonic weaving of Ancient Acupuncture Medicine, Movement Meditation, and Sound Healing. Let yourself rest, relax and rejuvenate in a collective frequency field of restorative bliss to reset into balance. Shentara Qigong at The Center SF Thursdays at 10:30 @ The Center SF, 548 Fillmore Street, San Francisco, CA We will meet in the beautiful movement space at the Center SF to breathe, stretch and flow through Daoist Wellness Qigong sequences to explore the alchemy of breath, embodied movement and meditation. Class is All-Levels and suitable for both beginners and more advanced practitioners.
